Greetings!

I am an Engineering Lead at Everstores. Previously, I worked at Delivery Hero and Celonis. I received my master’s and bachelor’s degree in computer science @TUM and @Bogazici University respectively.

I like simple explanations in plain language, and in this blog occasionally I write on data structures/algorithms and programming puzzles.
